result.arabic_text: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَهَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ أَقۡسَمُواْ بِٱللَّهِ جَهۡدَ أَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ إِنَّهُمۡ لَمَعَكُمۡۚ حَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَٰلُهُمۡ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ خَٰسِرِينَ
result.translation: Muri ico gihe, abemeramana bazobwirana hagati yabo bitangaza bati: “Mbega none, aba ni bo barahiye bakarengwa kw’izina ry’Imana Allah, ko mu vy’ukuri bari kumwe na mwe!”. Ibikorwa vyabo rero vyarahungurutse bicika impfagusa kuko babikorana uburyarya, nta co bazokuramwo atari agahombo kw’isi no mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
